item.title: Welcome Nice-DAG
item.description: Hey guys, here Nice-DAG want to say Hi to developers who want to realize a fancy DAG visualization. It's not a component-based library but a framework which allows developer to have powerful controls that show high-customized DAG activities, edges as well as editing operations.
item.content:encoded: Hey guys, here Nice-DAG want to say Hi to developers who want to realize a fancy DAG visualization. It's not a component-based library but a framework which allows developer to have powerful controls that show high-customized DAG activities, edges as well as editing operations.
